attributes.additional_details: Grandparents and non biological grandparents who have always been there for their grandchildren but are now being stopped from seeing them due to spiteful parents or any other reason they NEED to have rights, why should the child suffer down to the mum or father moving on? Why should the grandparents miss out when they have done nothing wrong. Stand up and make sure grandparents are heard even non biological grandparents who have always been there and done everything for the child.
